message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll take half, it's a fair deal!
I'll give you a bit more, but I need to keep some for myself!
I'll take a bit more, I'm willing to take the risk of inflation!
I'm taking a bigger share, but it's the best I can do!
I'll take the lion's share, I'm not getting any younger!
I'm taking what I can get, it's almost worthless anyway!
I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not giving up!
I'm taking almost everything, it's not worth fighting over!
I'll give up, you can have it all!
